name: Zafehouse Diaries 2
description: Zafehouse Diaries 2 is a game of survival, exploration and relationships. Every hour, designate tasks for your handful of characters - each with their own skills, motivations and prejudices - and try to outlast the zombie apocalypse.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, 8.1 or 10 Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.2GHz or AMD Athlon 64 X2 5000 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 560 / AMD Radeon R7 250X with 1GB DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 300 MB available space
